Room.Name: Crystal Alcove
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a very dis-illusioning place where nothing is what it appears to be. The crystal reflects all light making it almost impossible to find you way around this place. You have to look carefully for each exit.
Room.LongDescription: It's a good thing your compass works because there's no way to figure out which direction you're going. All you can make out that iis significant are the various exits out of the place. There appear to be an infinite number of stairways up and down, but strangely about three times more exits going down than up. All the exits look like they're very far away.
